```{r Visualisation des taille de librairie, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
toto = NULL
for (i in 1:length(csv_files)) {
  #cat(sprintf(paste0("## ",csv_files[i],"\n\n")))
  csv_all = read.table(paste0(file=file.quality,csv_files[i]),sep=",",header=TRUE)
  csv_replace = str_replace(csv_files[i],".csv","")
  toto = c(toto, knit_expand(text="# {{csv_replace}}\n\n{{dt}}\n\n", quiet = TRUE , echo =F,message=F,dt = (DT::datatable(csv_all, caption =" Tableau des statistiques des tailles , %N , GC% et profondeur des contigs de l'assemblage",
              rownames = NULL,
              colnames = c(colnames(csv_all)),
              escape = FALSE,
              class = 'table table-striped table-bordered table-hover',
              extensions = 'Buttons',
              filter = list(position = 'top', clear = FALSE, plain = TRUE),
              option= list(
                         paging=TRUE,searching = TRUE,ordering=TRUE,scrollCollapse=FALSE,server = TRUE, autoWidth = TRUE,
                         dom = 'BRSPQlfrtip',
                         buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print')
                         )
             )
  )))
  
}
```
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, include=TRUE}
cat(paste(knit(text = toto,quiet=T), collapse = '\n'))
```
